main.name: Nikola Gjakovik
main.description: Software Engineer with a passion for creative solutions
main.bio: I have a passion for efficiency and performance. I am an expert in high-reliability, multithreaded and multicore software. I have worked on concurrent data structures, CPU scheduling, threading and distributed systems. I have intimate experience debugging conservative locks, wasteful memory allocations, cache misses and false sharing. If you have weird heisenbugs and race conditions, I can track, test and fix them anywhere in the stack, from the OS kernel to the compiler to the application program itself.
main.contactmessage: Please contact me at my email: nikolag@umich.edu

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Ask me about ApeSearch, my distributed search engine from scratch in C++.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Machine learning pipeline infrastructure and data storage applications for novel protein design.
